Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc2047

Class RFC2047Decoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc2047.RFC2047Decoder
  • public class RFC2047Decoder
extends java.lang.Object
    High-performance decoder for RFC 2047 encoded-words and RFC 2231 parameter encoding with support for:
    • RFC 2047 encoded-words (=?charset?encoding?encoded-text?=)
    • RFC 2231 parameter encoding (name*=charset'lang'%XX%YY...)
    • Multiple character sets and encodings
    This implementation uses character-by-character parsing instead of regex for significantly better performance, especially for large headers.
    Author:
    Chris Burdess
    See Also:
    RFC 2047, RFC 2231
